item.title: ITSA第五屆桂冠賽 挑戰組
item.description: 目錄 [A1] Extended Absolute Mode 題目 input 題解 作法 AC code #include <cstdio>#include <algorithm>#include <vector> using namespace std; typedef pair <int,int> pii; typedef long long ll; #define pb push_back #define sz(a) (int)a.size() #define INF 0x3f3f3f3f #define st first #define nd second #define fio ios::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(0) #define DEBUG(x) printf("Here: %d\n", x), exit(0); // LLONG_MIN LLONG_MAX INT_MIN INT_MAX vector <int> v; int cnt[200]; int pre[200]; int main(){ int TC; scanf("%d", &TC); while(TC--){ int n, d; v.
